title: Configure Release Signing
description: Set up a complete Android release signing configuration.
instructions: Write the complete build.gradle signing configuration that: 1) Loads key.properties safely (handling missing file), 2) Defines a release signing config, 3) Applies it to the release build type with minifyEnabled and shrinkResources enabled.

hints.text: Use rootProject.file('key.properties') to get the file reference
Check if the file exists with .exists() before loading
Use the ternary operator to handle null storeFile: keystoreProperties['storeFile'] ? file(...) : null

commonMistakes.consequence: Build fails on machines without the file (like CI before secrets are set)
commonMistakes.correction: Wrap the load() call in an if (file.exists()) check

commonMistakes.mistake: Using file() without null check on storeFile
